description: A heavy protective coat worn by firefighters.  Highly resistant to heat and flame, it provides excellent protection from injury.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A piece of clerical clothing, usually worn by Christian priests.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A fur coat with a couple small pockets.  Extremely warm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A garishly-colored faux fur coat with a couple small pockets.  Although not as warm as the natural fur, it gives you some of that unique flair.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A very well-made fur coat, featuring thick panels of sable fur.  Very warm and very good-looking.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A long white coat with several large pockets.  Comes with a very nice pocket protector.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A plastic coat with a hood and two very large pockets.  Provides protection from rain.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

An intricately sewn coat of treated and split intestines, prized for its light weight and waterproofness among the indigenous peoples of the arctic.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A padded coat with deep pockets and a hood.  Very warm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick fur full-length duster.  Has many pockets for storage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick faux fur duster, falling below your knees.  Has many pockets for storing things.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This double-breasted uniform is unusually thick to protect against the heat of the kitchen.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A bright & cheaply made FEMA-issue windbreaker jacket with a hood.  One size, fits none.  Helps keep you unfrozen & visible for rescuers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A candy-apple-red leather jacket with black strips and shoulder protrusions.  It has a number of zippers and snaps in the front.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thin cotton jacket with a hood.  Good for brisk weather.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A light synthetic jacket with a hood.  Not very warm, but will keep out the rain.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
